LanguageData.Inglix.Biosculpter_Description: An immersive pod equipped with a biosculpting fluid injector and attached control system. It can perform a variety of biological alterations including age reversal and pleasure-giving. Each pod becomes biotuned to its user, and cannot be used by anyone else. Biotuning resets after {0} days. Believers in transhumanism believe biosculpter pods are of critical importance in their quest to transcend normal human physical limitations.
LanguageData.Inglix.Biosculpter_Description_No_Biotun: An immersive pod equipped with a biosculpting fluid injector and attached control system. It can perform a variety of biological alterations including age reversal and pleasure-giving. Believers in transhumanism believe biosculpter pods are of critical importance in their quest to transcend normal human physical limitations.
LanguageData.BiosculpterAutoAgeReversalDescription: Automatically satisfy {PAWN_labelShort}'s desire to run an age reversal treatment in this pod, in accordance with {PAWN_possessive} beliefs. {NEXTTREATMENT}
